#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
vector<long long int>v;
int main()
{
	long long int t,i,j,k,l,n,m;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		v.clear();
		cin>>n;
		n-=1;
		if(n==0)
		{
			cout<<"0"<<endl;
			continue;
		}
		while(n>0)
		{
			v.push_back(n%5);
			n/=5;
		}
		for(i=v.size()-1;i>=0;i--)
			cout<<(2*v[i]);
		cout<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
